title: inSurance Claim #QmZM1Ch - Follow up
body:
[SUMMARY]
The insurance policy becomes effective on the 7th day of placing SURE tokens in the private wallet. 
Based on the insurance claim, the policy was bought on April 12th, 2021. 
I.e. insurance policy becomes effective April 19th 2021.

The transaction provided by the policyholder: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x3e652f9df43fb8171e5c6a9e95a05e0553fed3718321a837e5aa6b13395f6d7c

The price per MTV was $0.01 on April 19th 2021  (Can be checked on CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/multivac/markets/)

The current price per MTV: $0.00405

Devaluation: 59.5% < 95% requirement

The % calculation can be checked by using this tool: https://percentagecalculator.net/

[RESOLUTION]: MTV tokens owned by the member have not devaluated more than 95% from the time of the insurance policy coverage start date. (Claim did not meet the minimal requirement)
A new insurance claim will need to be filed when the token price will lose 95% of the coverage start date.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
